sentences.en: 'You deceive yourself, monsieur,'returned the keeper of the wine - shop.
sentences.cn: “ 你认错人了, 先生, ” 酒店老板回答.

sentences.en: "I don't know where he is," Hughes replied. "I'm not his keeper."
sentences.cn: “我不知道他在哪儿，”休斯回答说。“我又不是他的保姆。”

sentences.en: Anglers are required to obtain prior authorization from the park keeper.
sentences.cn: 垂钓者必须事先得到公园管理者的许可.

sentences.en: Bob is head lion keeper at the zoo.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃是动物园养狮主管。

sentences.en: He found a job as a keeper.
sentences.cn: 他找到了一份当饲养员的工作.

sentences.en: He is also acknowledged as an excellent goal-keeper.
sentences.cn: 他也被公认为是一名出色的守门员。

sentences.en: He might lose his job as keeper.
sentences.cn: 他也许会丢掉他当监护人的职位吧.

sentences.en: He reloaded and nodded to the game-keeper.
sentences.cn: 他给枪重新装上子弹，然后朝猎场看守人点了点头。

sentences.en: I told the door - keeper to deny me to all callers.
sentences.cn: 我关照传达室不接见任何客人.

sentences.en: In soccer, only the goal - keeper may play the ball with his hands.
sentences.cn: 在足球运动中只有守门员可以用手触球.

sentences.en: The bee - keeper Old Liang showed me around.
sentences.cn: 养蜂员老梁领我走进“大厦”.

sentences.en: The gate - keeper demanded my business.
The inn - keeper smiled and immediately went out.
sentences.cn: 客栈老板微微一笑便出去了.

sentences.en: the keeper of geology at the museum
sentences.cn: 博物馆地质资料的保管人

sentences.en: The lock keeper closed the lock gate.
sentences.cn: 船闸管理员关上了闸门.

sentences.en: We saw the Park Keeper telling a bunch of older boys to get off the swings.
sentences.cn: 我们看到公园管理员让一些大男孩从秋千上下来。

words.tran_cn: 保持；维持；保管（keep的过去式和过去分词）
监护人；饲养员；看守人；管理人

phrases.tran_cn: 客房服务员；内务处理程序
